select id id, task_id taskId, product_id productId, warehouse_genre warehouseGenre, receive_count receiveCount,
apply_count applyCount, retreat_type retreatType, retreat_count retreatCount, out_dtl_id outDtlId, out_count outCount,
in_dtl_id inDtlId, in_count inCount, cuser cuser, cdate cdate, uuser uuser,
udate udate, remark remark, isdisable isdisable from vmes_equipment_maintainTask_detail
and ${queryStr}
and code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}),'%')
and name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}),'%')
order by ${orderStr}
